sentences.en: Fertilizer will accelerate the growth of these tomato plants.
sentences.cn: 肥料将促进这些西红柿秧生长.

sentences.en: Growth will accelerate to 2.9 per cent next year.
He decided to accelerate his advertising.
sentences.cn: 他决定增加广告的数量.

sentences.en: Let's accelerate the speed of our community construction.
sentences.cn: 让我们加快我们社区建设的速度.

sentences.en: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.cn: 加快经济增长速度的措施

sentences.en: Our country should accelerate the economic growth.
Perhaps the fact that the car was tailgating him made him accelerate.
sentences.cn: 或许是因为那辆汽车跟得太紧，他才加速的。

sentences.en: Sunshine, fresh air, and rest often accelerate a person's recovery from sickness.
sentences.cn: 阳光 、 新鲜空气和休息常会促使病人早日康复.

sentences.en: The leader is losing ground as the rest of the runners accelerate.
sentences.cn: 领先者在其馀赛跑者加速时就逐渐失去了优势.

sentences.en: The particle will accelerate under the action of the applied force.
sentences.cn: 这个粒子在所加力的作用下将作加速运动.

sentences.en: This, of course, would nullify the effect of the move and merely accelerate inflation.
sentences.cn: 这毫无疑问会使该举措完全失效，而仅仅只是加速通货膨胀。

sentences.en: We expected to accelerate trade, the exchange of persons, and eventually diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 我们期望加速贸易, 交流人员, 以至最终建立外交关系.

sentences.en: We must seize all opportunities to accelerate development.
sentences.cn: 必须抓住一切机遇加快发展.

sentences.en: We need to accelerate the pace of change in our backward country.
sentences.cn: 我们应当为落后的祖国加快变革的脚步。

sentences.en: We should accelerate our research in atomic power generation and speed up the building of atomic power plants.
sentences.cn: 我们要加快原子能发电的研究,加速原子能电站的建设.

words.tran_cn: 促进的，[物] 加速的；催化的
加速，促进；[物] 加速度
油门；催化剂；[机] 加速装置

trans.tran_en: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect
if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect
if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect
